name: Topical Authority
summary: Establishing comprehensive expertise on a subject through extensive, interlinked content coverage.
explanation: Topical authority means becoming the definitive resource on a subject by thoroughly covering all aspects of a topic. Instead of targeting isolated keywords, you create interconnected content that demonstrates deep expertise. Key strategies include: content clusters (pillar pages linked to supporting articles), comprehensive coverage (answering all questions in a topic area), internal linking (connecting related content), and consistent publishing (ongoing coverage vs one-off posts). Search engines increasingly favor sites with demonstrated expertise over thin content across many topics.
